page.title: 12RECREATION IN AMMANFORD
page.content: Ammanford is a small town and so it offers few recreational facilities. The Ammanford Snooker Club is open to it's 200 members on six days of the week.The Squash Club at Penybanc has 120 members. The Rugby Club has two practice sessions a week and a weekly match in the regular season. The Ammanford Cricket Club has 250 members and the teams play two matches a week during the playing season. The Karate Club is a recent and popular addition. The 50 members meet up to four times a week and stage monthly competitions. There is also an active Boxing and Swimming club. There is a swimming poolin the grounds of the A.V.C.S. There are no cinemas,theatres or dance halls in the the town.Apart from discos held in local clubs there is little entertianment for young people.
